# Handige bronnen

Hier staan links naar bronnen om Quarto, R en aanverwante technieken mee te leren.

-   **Quarto**
    -   [Beginnen met Quarto](https://quarto.org/docs/get-started/hello/rstudio.html)
    -   [Hart voor Brabant quarto handleidingen](https://jolien-ggd.quarto.pub/)
-   **R**
    -   [Cheatsheets](https://posit.co/resources/cheatsheets/)
    -   [R for Data Science](https://r4ds.had.co.nz/)
    -   [Advanced R](https://adv-r.hadley.nz/)
    -   [Efficient R](https://csgillespie.github.io/efficientR/)
    -   [R en databases](https://db.rstudio.com/)
    -   [Grote verzameling R boeken](https://bookdown.org/)
    -   [Visualisaties](https://r-graphics.org/)
-   [W3schools (voor o.a. css en html)](https://www.w3schools.com/)
